title: Is it 4 days or 3?
body:
Hey, so i'm kinda confused if the preseason ends on the 17th or the 16th for OCE players. When i logged into my league account today it says there are 4 days left until preseason ends, but that would mean it starts on the 17th... but then the official rundown of preseason states that it starts on the 16th.... 
Kinda confused and any help would be appreciated

replies.body: It[ 100% starts on the 16th](https://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/2017-ranked-season-ends-november-7) so I'm not quite sure what the client is trying to tell us
